system:
note description: "Facilities for accessing default pixmaps." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "pixmap, default" date: "$Date: 2013-05-20 16:15:17 -0700 (Mon, 20 May 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 92557 $"
class ../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xmlEV_STOCK_PIXMAPS
create Falsedefault_create
feature -- Default pixmaps
f_information_pixel_buffer../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_information_pixel_bufferInformation_pixel_buffer: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER -- Pixel buffer symbolizing a piece of information. once Result := ../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_implementationImplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_information_pixel_bufferinformation_pixel_buffer end
f_error_pixel_buffer../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_error_pixel_bufferError_pixel_buffer: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER -- Pixel buffer symbolizing an error. once Result := ../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_implementationImplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_error_pixel_buffererror_pixel_buffer end
f_warning_pixel_buffer../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_warning_pixel_bufferWarning_pixel_buffer: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER -- Pixel buffer symbolizing a warning. once Result := ../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_implementationImplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_warning_pixel_bufferwarning_pixel_buffer end
f_question_pixel_buffer../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_question_pixel_bufferQuestion_pixel_buffer: ../interface/ev_pixel_buffer.xmlEV_PIXEL_BUFFER -- Pixel buffer symbolizing a question. once Result := ../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_implementationImplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_question_pixel_bufferquestion_pixel_buffer end
f_information_pixmap../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_information_pixmapInformation_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap symbolizing a piece of information. once Result := ../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_implementationImplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_information_pixmapinformation_pixmap end
f_error_pixmap../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_error_pixmapError_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap symbolizing an error. once Result := ../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_implementationImplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_error_pixmaperror_pixmap end
f_warning_pixmap../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_warning_pixmapWarning_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap symbolizing a warning. once Result := ../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_implementationImplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_warning_pixmapwarning_pixmap end
f_question_pixmap../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_question_pixmapQuestion_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap symbolizing a question. once Result := ../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_implementationImplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_question_pixmapquestion_pixmap end
f_default_window_icon../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_default_window_iconDefault_window_icon: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap used as default icon for new windows. once Result := ../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_implementationImplementation.../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xml#f_default_window_icondefault_window_icon end
feature -- Default cursors
f_busy_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_busy_cursorBusy_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Standard arrow and small hourglass once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_busy_cursorbusy_cursor) end
f_standard_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_standard_cursorStandard_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Standard arrow once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_standard_cursorstandard_cursor) end
f_crosshair_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_crosshair_cursorCrosshair_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Crosshair once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_crosshair_cursorcrosshair_cursor) end
f_help_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_help_cursorHelp_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Arrow and question mark once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_help_cursorhelp_cursor) end
f_ibeam_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_ibeam_cursorIbeam_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- I-beam once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_ibeam_cursoribeam_cursor) end
f_no_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_no_cursorNo_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Slashed_circle once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_no_cursorno_cursor) end
f_sizeall_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_sizeall_cursorSizeall_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Four-pointed arrow pointing north, south, east and west once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_sizeall_cursorsizeall_cursor) end
f_sizens_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_sizens_cursorSizens_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Double-pointed arrow pointing north and south once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_sizens_cursorsizens_cursor) end
f_sizenwse_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_sizenwse_cursorSizenwse_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Double-pointed arrow pointing north-west and south-east once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_sizenwse_cursorsizenwse_cursor) end
f_sizenesw_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_sizenesw_cursorSizenesw_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Double-pointed arrow pointing north-east and south-west once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_sizenesw_cursorsizenesw_cursor) end
f_sizewe_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_sizewe_cursorSizewe_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Double-pointed arrow pointing west and east once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_sizewe_cursorsizewe_cursor) end
f_uparrow_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_uparrow_cursorUparrow_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Vertical arrow once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_uparrow_cursoruparrow_cursor) end
f_wait_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_wait_cursorWait_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Hourglass once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_wait_cursorwait_cursor) end
f_header_sizewe_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_header_sizewe_cursorHeader_sizewe_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Cursor used when resizing header widget columns. once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_header_sizewe_cursorheader_sizewe_cursor) end
f_hyperlink_cursor../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_hyperlink_cursorHyperlink_cursor: ../interface/ev_pointer_style.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE -- Cursor used when over a hyperlink. once create Result.../interface/ev_pointer_style.xml#f_make_predefinedmake_predefined ({../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xmlEV_POINTER_STYLE_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_pointer_style_constants.xml#f_hyperlink_cursorhyperlink_cursor) end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_implementation../interface/ev_stock_pixmaps.xml#f_implementationImplementation: ../implementation_gtk/ev_stock_pixmaps_imp.xmlEV_STOCK_PIXMAPS_IMP -- Responsible for interaction with native graphics toolkit. once create Result end
